thread.section_title: Fabletics Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Fabletics | fabletics.com | 14 of 532
thread.title: Kim Braley

author: Kim Braley
title: Kim Braley
text: Fabletics offers a wide range of fashionable items that are true to size, comfortable and made of quality fabrics and construction. in addition, the items I've purchased are really great for workouts/running, not just athleisure. The prices and shipping costs are reasonable, and items are received very quickly. The TV ads are goofy, but I would (and do) recommend Fabletics to anyone who likes good workout clothes at a decent price point.
